segment.source: Take a Test app technical reference
segment.target: Take a Test app technical reference

segment.source: The policies and settings applied by the Take a Test app.
segment.target: The policies and settings applied by the Take a Test app.

segment.source: Take a Test app technical reference (Preview)
segment.target: Take a Test app technical reference (Preview)

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.

segment.source: Take a Test is an app that locks down the PC and displays an online assessment web page.
segment.target: Take a Test is an app that locks down the PC and displays an online assessment web page.

segment.source: Whether you are a teacher or IT administrator, you can easily configure Take a Test to meet your testing needs.
segment.target: Whether you are a teacher or IT administrator, you can easily configure Take a Test to meet your testing needs.

segment.source: For high-stakes tests, the app creates a browser-based, locked-down environment for more secure online assessments.
segment.target: For high-stakes tests, the app creates a browser-based, locked-down environment for more secure online assessments.

segment.source: This means that students taking the tests that don’t have copy/paste privileges, can’t access to files and applications, and are free from distractions.
segment.target: This means that students taking the tests that don’t have copy/paste privileges, can’t access to files and applications, and are free from distractions.

segment.source: For simple tests and quizzes, Take a Test can be configured to use the teacher’s preferred assessment website to deliver digital assessments
segment.target: For simple tests and quizzes, Take a Test can be configured to use the teacher’s preferred assessment website to deliver digital assessments

segment.source: Assessment vendors can use Take a Test as a platform to lock down the operating system.
segment.target: Assessment vendors can use Take a Test as a platform to lock down the operating system.

segment.source: Take a Test supports the SBAC browser API standard for high stakes common core testing.
segment.target: Take a Test supports the SBAC browser API standard for high stakes common core testing.

segment.source: (Link to Javascript API when available)
segment.target: (Link to Javascript API when available)

segment.source: PC lockdown for assessment
segment.target: PC lockdown for assessment

segment.source: When the assessment page initiates lock down, the student’s desktop will be locked and the app will be launched above the Windows lock screen to provide a sandbox that ensures the student can only interact with the Take a Test app .
segment.target: When the assessment page initiates lock down, the student’s desktop will be locked and the app will be launched above the Windows lock screen to provide a sandbox that ensures the student can only interact with the Take a Test app .

segment.source: After transitioning to the lock screen, Take a Test will apply local MDM policies to further lock down the device.
segment.target: After transitioning to the lock screen, Take a Test will apply local MDM policies to further lock down the device.

segment.source: The whole process of going above the lock screen and applying policies is what defines lockdown.
segment.target: The whole process of going above the lock screen and applying policies is what defines lockdown.

segment.source: The lockdown process is atomic, which means that if any part of the lockdown operation fails, the app will not be above lock and won't have any of the policies applied.
segment.target: The lockdown process is atomic, which means that if any part of the lockdown operation fails, the app will not be above lock and won't have any of the policies applied.

segment.source: When running above the lock screen:
segment.target: When running above the lock screen:

segment.source: The app runs full screen with no chrome
segment.target: The app runs full screen with no chrome

segment.source: The hardware print screen button is disabled
segment.target: The hardware print screen button is disabled

segment.source: Content within the app will show up as black in screen capturing/sharing software Copy/paste is disabled
segment.target: Content within the app will show up as black in screen capturing/sharing software Copy/paste is disabled

segment.source: Web apps can query the processes currently running in the user’s device
segment.target: Web apps can query the processes currently running in the user’s device

segment.source: Extended display shows up as black
segment.target: Extended display shows up as black

segment.source: Auto-fill is disabled
segment.target: Auto-fill is disabled

segment.source: Mobile device management (MDM) policies
segment.target: Mobile device management (MDM) policies

segment.source: When Take a Test is running, the following MDM policies are applied to lock down the PC.
segment.target: When Take a Test is running, the following MDM policies are applied to lock down the PC.

segment.source: Policy
segment.target: Policy

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Value
segment.target: Value

segment.source: AllowToasts
segment.target: AllowToasts

segment.source: Disables toast notifications from being shown
segment.target: Disables toast notifications from being shown

segment.source: AllowAppStoreAutoUpdate
segment.target: AllowAppStoreAutoUpdate

segment.source: Disables automatic updates for Windows Store apps that are installed on the PC
segment.target: Disables automatic updates for Windows Store apps that are installed on the PC

segment.source: AllowDeviceDiscovery
segment.target: AllowDeviceDiscovery

segment.source: Disables UI for screen sharing
segment.target: Disables UI for screen sharing

segment.source: AllowInput Panel
segment.target: AllowInput Panel

segment.source: Disables the onscreen keyboard which will disable auto-fill
segment.target: Disables the onscreen keyboard which will disable auto-fill

segment.source: AllowCortana
segment.target: AllowCortana

segment.source: Disables Cortana functionality
segment.target: Disables Cortana functionality

segment.source: AllowAutoupdate
segment.target: AllowAutoupdate

segment.source: Disables Windows Update from starting OS updates
segment.target: Disables Windows Update from starting OS updates

segment.source: Allowed functionality
segment.target: Allowed functionality

segment.source: When Take a Test is running, the following functionality is available to students:
segment.target: When Take a Test is running, the following functionality is available to students:

segment.source: Assistive technology that is configured to run above the lock screen should run as expected
segment.target: Assistive technology that is configured to run above the lock screen should run as expected

segment.source: Narrator is available through Windows key + Enter
segment.target: Narrator is available through Windows key + Enter

segment.source: Magnifier is available through Windows key + "+" key
segment.target: Magnifier is available through Windows key + "+" key

segment.source: Full screen mode is compatible
segment.target: Full screen mode is compatible

segment.source: The student can press Alt+Tab when locked down.
segment.target: The student can press Alt+Tab when locked down.

segment.source: This results in the student being able to switch between the following:
segment.target: This results in the student being able to switch between the following:

segment.source: Take a Test
segment.target: Take a Test

segment.source: Assistive technology that may be running
segment.target: Assistive technology that may be running

segment.source: Lock Screen (not available if student is using a dedicated test account)
segment.target: Lock Screen (not available if student is using a dedicated test account)

segment.source: Note The app will exit if the student signs in to an account from the lock screen.
segment.target: Note The app will exit if the student signs in to an account from the lock screen.

segment.source: Progress made in the test may be lost or invalidated.
segment.target: Progress made in the test may be lost or invalidated.

segment.source: The student can exit the test by pressing one of the following key combinations:
segment.target: The student can exit the test by pressing one of the following key combinations:

segment.source: Ctrl+Alt+Del
segment.target: Ctrl+Alt+Del

segment.source: Alt+F4 (Take a Test will restart if the student is using a dedicated test account)
segment.target: Alt+F4 (Take a Test will restart if the student is using a dedicated test account)
